item.title: T3chFest 2023 Hackathon
item.description: Yesterday I went to my first hackathon! The theme was technology in vulnerable situations and zones and we could build anything we wanted. At first, I was somewhat overwhelmed as I was thinking about cool ideas along with my other two teammates. We only had 10 hours to build a functional prototype and time was running. After getting our brains powered with sugar from the breakfast the organization gave us, we got an idea: a map of war-affected areas that could help civilians locate important events and resources.
